    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME"))

item.title: Else without if {PI}
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[code] public void writeCommandLog(String command)
{
checkDateAndTime();
String filePath = “./Data/Commands2.txt”;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try
      {            
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(filePath, true));
         bw.write("[" + c.date + "]" + "-" + "[" + c.currentTime + " " + checkTimeOfDay() + "]: "
            + "[" + c.playerName + "]: " + "[" + c.connectedFrom + "] "
             +  "::" + command);
         bw.newLine();
         bw.flush();
      }
      catch (IOException ioe)
      {
         ioe.printStackTrace();
      }
      finally
      {
         if (bw != null)
         {
            try
            {
               bw.close();
            }
            catch (IOException ioe2)
            {
            } else if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(USERNAME"))) {
}
return;
}

}[/code]

item.title: Else without if {PI}
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

I am trying to make an exception within the commandlogs.txt within playerassistant.java

public void writeCommandLog(String command)
{
	checkDateAndTime();	
	String filePath = "./Data/Commands2.txt";
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
	
	try 
	{				
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(filePath, true));
		bw.write("[" + c.date + "]" + "-" + "[" + c.currentTime + " " + checkTimeOfDay() + "]: " 
			+ "[" + c.playerName + "]: " + "[" + c.connectedFrom + "] "
			 +  "::" + command);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} 
	catch (IOException ioe) 
	{
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} 
	finally 
	{
		if (bw != null)
		{
			try 
			{
				bw.close();
			} 
			catch (IOException ioe2) 
			{
			} else {
	if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(USERNAME"))) {

}
return;
}
